lyrics:
38 contributorstranslationsespañolportuguêstürkçedream of you lyricsverse 1
hes a bad dancer hes the right answer
hes a shy singer most of the time
unless its him and i
hes an overthinker hes a slow kisser
a confessed sinner all of the time
when its him and i

prechorus
and you squeeze my hands two times three times
and believe me ill love you always always

chorus
all i do the whole day through is dream of you
all i do since i met you is dream of you
so could you stay with me lay with me
talking bout nothing
all i do the whole day through is dream of you

verse 2
i was not living i was just writing about it
with my head spinning
days passing by most of the time yeah

prechorus
and you squeeze my hands two times three times
and believe me ill love you always always always

so could you stay with me lay with me

i dream of you
i dream of you
yeah only you
i dream of you

woah boy boy
